pages.body:
IPFS means inter planetary file system 

It can also be called universal and distributed file network ( udfNet )

- [What is IPFS ?]() : TCP/IP + crypto + DHT
- [How to use it ?]() : terminal , IPFS local interface ( 5001 ) , gateways


- **Services :**
   * [code sharing - cross-IT-languages](http://ipfsbin.xyz/#QmRJo4QeNKq71cAxg1RcAnz59vq9jFV9XPx6xUtnBX5ZMY)
   * [QR code generator](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmccqhJg5wm5kNjAP4k4HrYxoqaXUGNuotDUqfvYBx8jrR/)
   * [Markdown reader](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTkzDwWqPbnAh5YiV5VwcTLnGdwSNsNTn2aDxdXBFca7D/home/readme.md)
   * [Markdown reader](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSrCRJmzE4zE1nAfWPbzVfanKQNBhp7ZWmMnEdbiLvYNh/mdown#/ipfs/QmfQ75DjAxYzxMP2hdm6o4wFwZS5t7uorEZ2pX9AKXEg2u)
   * [Markdown reader](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmWPgJnUGLB1LPh9KMG9LEN4LVu5e17TwkEtcmTWdNn9V6/#/ipfs/QmfQ75DjAxYzxMP2hdm6o4wFwZS5t7uorEZ2pX9AKXEg2u)
   * [chatrooms Orbit](http://orbit.libp2p.io/#/connect?_k=2gazhq)
   * [ipfstube](https://ipfstube.erindachtler.me/) : media player and uploader
   * [QR code generator](https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmccqhJg5wm5kNjAP4k4HrYxoqaXUGNuotDUqfvYBx8jrR/qr#enter%252520text%252520here)


Read more about [[security]]

Meow!
